column3: I read it and I really liked it!
column4: I've never been there before, but that sounds really fun!

column2: Hello Ding! Its that book I was talking about, the Big Friendly Giant by Roald Dahl! I'm rereading it because it's the best!
column3: Yay I'm glad you liked it! You wanna go to the library with me and get more books? My dad is taking me after school!
